sys:positions.title: Member of the Nepalese Legislature for Taplejung-1

description: Kul Prasad Uprety is a Nepalese politician. As a candidate for the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist-Leninist), Uprety won the 1991 Nepalese legislative election in the Taplejung-1 seat with 12,703 votes. For the 1994 election, he was replaced as the CPN(UML) candidate. After the CPN(UML) split, Uprety joined the dissident Communist Party of Nepal (Marxist-Leninist) and contested the 1999 legislative election in the same constituency, receiving 1,289 votes.
short_description: Nepalese politician who won the 1991 legislative election for the Taplejung-1 seat.
